name: Elite Killer Commando
description:
Elite Killer Commando is most adventurous games among all other fps games or fps shooting games. If you are elite commando type person and want to accomplish the commando mission all alone as an elite killer then go after one of these fps games or fps shooting games. These fps games or fps shooting games are actually a great opportunity for all these highly trained elite killers. As in these fps games or fps shooting games you are playing the role of elite killer with unlimited shooting spree and you will charge the commando mission being an elite commando killer.
Features
3D Environments
Real life sound effects
Variety of weapons
Missions to complete in time
Immersive game play
Strategy required to execute the enemy.
